Michigan State University's Official Hackathon

Spartahack VI

Live by the code

Jan. 24-26, 2020

The weekend of January 24th we're bringing together students of all skill levels and disciplines with tech industry professionals at Michigan State University. Every year at Spartahack we provide a space to get creative with tech, make connections, and forget the words "I can't."

We're excited to see what you will create!

See Past Projects & Prizes!

Sponsor Spartahack

Our sponsors make it possible for our annual event to host 1,000+ emerging developers, designers, and builders. Those who contribute to the event have the opportunity to help guide next generation of tech workers.


Interested in sponsoring?

Email us - hello@Spartahack.com
